To measure effect metformin expression phosphorylated acetyl-CoA carboxylase alpha ( ACC ) , phosphorylated mechanistic target rapamycin ( serine/threonine kinase ) ( mTOR ) , pancreatic cancer stem cell . OUTLINE : Patients randomize 1 3 treatment group . GROUP I : Patients undergo observation . GROUP II : Patients receive metformin hydrochloride orally ( PO ) twice daily ( BID ) least 7 day absence disease progression unacceptable toxicity . GROUP III : Patients receive metformin hydrochloride Group II . After completion study treatment , patient follow 30 day .
